text: Buli atabasembezenga wadde okuwuliriza ebigambo byammwe, bwe mubanga muva mu kibuga ekyo oba mu nnyumba eyo, mukunkumulanga enfuufu10:14 Omuntu okukunkumulira omulala enfuufu y’ebigere bye, kaali kabonero akaakolebwanga Abafalisaayo nga bava mu bitundu bannamawanga gye baabeeranga, ebyalowoozebwanga okuba ebitali birongoofu. ey’oku bigere byammwe.
